long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I found that there were far too many links that I wanted to click on while reading a Wikipedia article. This distracted me from reading the article I initially wanted to read and led me down the rabbit hole towards topics I had no intention of reading. The idea behind creating this extension was to remove those links so that I could focus on reading. Although this was intially made for Wikipedia, it may be used on any site with distracting links.
